name: Hexa Jumper Jam
description:
"The adventurous journey of a hexagon jumping over buildings🏭 from various cities🌆across the world, trying not to fall in the burning lava🔥"

___________________________________________________________________________

Explore :

New York City

Paris

Toronto

Singapore 

Dubai

...and many more coming soon

Control instructions🎮

1. Tap (mouse click) on the screen or use the up and down arrow key to jump the hexagon

2. You can triple jump at a time, then you lose all your energy. Losing the energy will mean the object to fall down. To regain energy again, touch the ground and then you can triple jump again.
